thread.title: Andres Iniesta makes 400th La Liga appearances for Barcelona in 2-1 win over Leganes — midfield magician has won eight titles, four Champions Leagues and netted World Cup winner in 2010
thread.title_full: Andres Iniesta makes 400th La Liga appearances for Barcelona in 2-1 win over Leganes — midfield magician has won eight titles, four Champions Leagues and netted World Cup winner in 2010

author: arichardson
title: Andres Iniesta makes 400th La Liga appearances for Barcelona in 2-1 win over Leganes — midfield magician has won eight titles, four Champions Leagues and netted World Cup winner in 2010
text:
EFL ini great Andres Iniesta makes 400th La Liga appearances for Barcelona in 2-1 win over Leganes — midfield magician has won eight titles, four Champions Leagues and netted World Cup winner in 2010 
Iconic Spaniard is only Catalan idol to receive standing ovation at Bernabeu by Real Madrid fans — a look back at his career Feature
